name: Scalding Rune
description: Inscribe a rune of cosmic fire on the earth, which takes 2 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the rune blasts all enemies in the target area for 2323 Flame Damage and an additional 1914 Flame Damage over 12 seconds.
effectLines: The rune also deals additional damage over time.
coefDescription: Inscribe a rune of cosmic fire on the earth, which takes 2 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the rune blasts all enemies in the target area for $1 Flame Damage and an additional $2 Flame Damage over 12 seconds.
